      • fetchText

        public List<LedgerText> fetchText()
                           throws com.sap.cloud.sdk.odatav2.connectivity.ODataException
        Fetches the LedgerText entities (one to many) associated with this entity. This corresponds to the OData navigation property to_Text.

        Please note: This method will not cache or persist the query results.

        Returns:
        List containing one or more associated LedgerText entities. If no entities are associated then an empty list is returned.
        Throws:
        com.sap.cloud.sdk.odatav2.connectivity.ODataException - If the entity is unmanaged, i.e. it has not been retrieved using the OData VDM's services and therefore has no ERP configuration context assigned. An entity is managed if it has been either retrieved using the VDM's services or returned from the VDM's services as the result of a CREATE or UPDATE call.

      • getTextOrFetch

        public List<LedgerText> getTextOrFetch()
                                throws com.sap.cloud.sdk.odatav2.connectivity.ODataException
        Retrieval of associated LedgerText entities (one to many).

        If the navigation property to_Text of a queried Ledger is operated lazily, an ODataException can be thrown in case of an OData query error.

        Please note: Lazy loading of OData entity associations is the process of asynchronous retrieval and persisting of items from a navigation property. If a lazy property is requested by the application for the first time and it has not yet been loaded, an OData query will be run in order to load the missing information and its result will get cached for future invocations.

        Returns:
        List of associated LedgerText entities.
        Throws:
        com.sap.cloud.sdk.odatav2.connectivity.ODataException - If the entity is unmanaged, i.e. it has not been retrieved using the OData VDM's services and therefore has no ERP configuration context assigned. An entity is managed if it has been either retrieved using the VDM's services or returned from the VDM's services as the result of a CREATE or UPDATE call.

      • getTextOrNull

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<List<LedgerText>> getTextOrNull()
        Retrieval of associated LedgerText entities (one to many).

        If the navigation property to_Text for an entity Ledger has not been resolved yet, this method will not query further information. Instead its Optional result state will be null.

        Returns:
        If the information for navigation property to_Text is already loaded, the result will contain the LedgerText entities. If not, a null value state is returned.

      • setText

        public void setText(@NonNull
                    List<LedgerText> value)
        Overwrites the list of associated LedgerText entities for the loaded navigation property to_Text.

        If the navigation property to_Text of a queried Ledger is operated lazily, an ODataException can be thrown in case of an OData query error.

        Please note: Lazy loading of OData entity associations is the process of asynchronous retrieval and persisting of items from a navigation property. If a lazy property is requested by the application for the first time and it has not yet been loaded, an OData query will be run in order to load the missing information and its result will get cached for future invocations.

        Parameters:
        value - List of LedgerText entities.

      • addText

        public void addText(LedgerText... entity)
        Adds elements to the list of associated LedgerText entities.

        If the navigation property to_Text of a queried Ledger is operated lazily, an ODataException can be thrown in case of an OData query error.

        Please note: Lazy loading of OData entity associations is the process of asynchronous retrieval and persisting of items from a navigation property. If a lazy property is requested by the application for the first time and it has not yet been loaded, an OData query will be run in order to load the missing information and its result will get cached for future invocations.

        Parameters:
        entity - Array of LedgerText entities.

public String getLedger()

        Returns:
        Identifies a ledger in General Ledger Accounting.

      • getIsLeadingLedger

        @Nullable
public Boolean getIsLeadingLedger()
        Constraints: none

        You must designate one of your ledgers as the leading ledger. However, it is not possible to designate more than one ledger as the leading ledger. Caution: As soon as the leading ledger contains transaction data, the Leading indicator can no longer be deselected.

        Returns:
        Identifies one of your ledgers as the leading ledger.

public ErpConfigContext getErpConfigContext()

        Returns:
        The stored ERP system context for executing queries, or null if no such context has been set.
